data.name: Trove - Mantle of Power Sampler Edition
data.detailed_description:
Grab your friends and set off for adventure in Trove, the ultimate action MMO!

Mantle of Power, Trove’s first expansion, is jam-packed with mountains of new content.
An increased level-cap, new ways to advance, customizable class abilities, wild new elemental worlds, and more are coming straight at you, and these packs are designed to help you jump straight in!

Get a taste of what the Mantle of Power expansion has to offer with the Mantle of Power Sampler Edition! Power up with a pair of Empowered Gems Boxes and everything needed to shine their contents up super nice.

Includes:

  • 2 Empowered Gem Boxes
  • 30 Gem Booster Boxes
  • 100 Jade Clover Boosters
  • 30 Glittering Horseshoe Boosters
  • 20 Lapis Luckbug Boosters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista 32-bit Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph Client and registered Trion Worlds Account

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two button mouse, Glyph Client, and registered Trion Worlds Account
